title: Rito snowy map pls
body: {{summoner:31}} Dear Riot please make a snowy map next year if you can and if you do i will leave you breathless for only 2.95 a minute, ty :D from BubberDucky{{summoner:31}}

replies.body: As much as I would love a Christmas map, there are many people that had major FPS issues with it when it was out. Whilst saying that, I don't see why it couldn't just be a re textured map without any animations, because I don't see too many people with FPS issues on the Howling abyss.
